sentences: Erling D. Bjerno (born 1929) is a Danish composer and organist.
He trained as an organist and was for years 1967-1996 employed by Ansgar Church in Aalborg.
During the same period he was employed as a teacher at Nordjysk Music.
As a composer, he was partly self-taught.
He made his debut in 1961 with his #1 Symphony.
Besides teaching music, chamber music, choral works and theater, radio and TV music, he has written symphonies, operas, etc.
He writes in a traditional style, which has not always been well received by the critics.
